reviewText: this is the best JS  Bach film i have seen. I saw this first as a clip at Bach's museum in Leipzig where they play clips from Bach films. Characters of  JS and his  sons  and king of prussia are shown with a lot of skill and now when i listen to JS or CPE Bach I cannot avoid visualizing them from the film...The best cameo part is the encounter with Voltaire on the border. there is a lot of story there behid this brief episode - Voltaire and prussian elite did not have "meeting of the minds"
